title: Looking for a Hindu (card that is)
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: Looking for a Hindu (card that is)
posts.post_content: Anyone got a Hindu they are looking to sell?  I'm only looking for a 1.5 or possibly 2 depending on the price.  NO 1's or authentic as I absolutely do not want one graded poor or altered.  Let me know what you got, eager buyer, money in your had ASAP!
